Once upon a time, Stephen wrote :

> # apt-get install 
> /mnt/cdrom/Linux/CDBurner/cdrtools-cdrecord-1.11a23-1.i386.rpm

This is not how apt is meant to be used, see Gordon's answer to your post
on the Valhalla list for details.

Matthias
